title: General position problems in strong and lexicographic products of graphs
authors:
Pakanun Dokyeesun and Sandi Klav\v{z}ar and Dorota Kuziak and Jing
  Tian
abstract:
Outer, dual, and total general position sets are studied on strong and
lexicographic products of graphs. Sharp lower and upper bounds are proved for
the outer and the dual general position number of strong products and several
exact values are obtained. For the lexicographic product, the outer general
position number is determined in all the cases, and the dual general position
number in many cases. The total general position number is determined for both
products. Along the way some results on outer general position sets are also
derived.
